Introduction

I am a recent Harvard extension graduate with a master's degree in Software Engineering. During my studies, I quickly recognized the transitional importance and enormous potential of deep learning and artificial intelligence which motivated me to simultaneously pursue a certificate in Data Science.

Building on a successful corporate career focused on financial, process and IT management, I intend to combine my technical skills and business experience to find new ways of solving age-old business challenges.

I have accumulated extensive experience in business operations and management with a unique set of skills that position me well to understand a broad scope of business functions and markets:

  • Controller of multi-location large engineered equipment manufacturer
  • Led numerous US and international new acquisition integrations
  • CIO of US Siemens Mobile Phone business
  • Digital transformation project leadership
  • Worked in Germany for 5 years (fluent in German) at Siemens Corporate headquarters

Academic Projects

A collection of academic projects demonstrating skills and technologies is linked below. These projects demonstrate both technical software development work as well as problem solving using various deep learning tasks.

These projects highlight a proficiency in Python using both Flask and Django to present web pages; however, I am also able to comfortably use Java for development. Deep Learning efforts include various image and NLP-based algorithms as well as other supervised and unsupervised machine learning tasks.
